myMath

Class Monom

  • java.lang.Object
    • myMath.Monom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    function

    public class Monom
extends java.lang.Object
implements function
    This class represents a simple "Monom" of shape a*x^b, where a is a real number and b is an integer. The class implements function and supports simple operations such as: construction, value at x, derivative, add and multiply. see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomial Monom has the following structure: a*x^b
    Author:
    Boaz
